name: The Door (acrofobiclunchbreak)
description:
Select the right door to escape and win money. Try to collect as much as you can. You can buy hints of the right door. 

One of the hints is always a lie unless the game specifically tells you that all of them are true. That can happen too!

You can drag the red X:s or green´s to help you think.  
Tap the clue to mark it.

Use HELP! to reveal a wrong door. It costs half of your CASH.
